subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Sloane Stephens lost to the 12th-seeded Ana Ivanovic in the third round of the United States Open for the second consecutive year, following fellow Americans Jack Sock, James Blake and Sam Querrey out of the tournament.
snippet: Sloane Stephens lost to the 12th-seeded Ana Ivanovic in the third round of the United States Open for the second consecutive year, following fellow Americans Jack Sock, James Blake and Sam Querrey out of the tournament.
